channel.title: How Do I Get A Moparscape Server Started?
channel.description:
Well, I'm new to this, I'm here because my guy just got banned from Runescape permanently, I don't even know the offences it won't let me see them.. I played on and off for 5 or 6 years, its something i have to get over. So, if anyone could kindly and hopfully be helpful enough to tell me how to just get a Moparscape server up and running, that'd be great, thanks ;)
No flaming. No name calling.

item.title: How Do I Get A Moparscape Server Started?
item.dc:creator: @Click_Here Click Here
item.description:
@Click_Here wrote:

if it says its ready to download, then there must be a button around there saying to click here to download.

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Get A Moparscape Server Started?

item.title: How Do I Get A Moparscape Server Started?
item.dc:creator: @reggamers reggamers
item.description:
@reggamers wrote:

Yup… I even click the BIG red words “DOWNLOAD MOPARSCAPE HERE”
and it takes me to a thing telling me to click here or here, AND something else.
Tried them all, the second “here” takes me to uppit, and i click the thing that says “Your Download Is Ready”
Page Cannot Be Displayed.
I think i give up on moparscape and runescape altogether if everything is just going to be a frickin mess.

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Get A Moparscape Server Started?

item.title: How Do I Get A Moparscape Server Started?

item.description:
@Click_Here wrote:

ok… yeah you should read mod taharoks ultimate guide in the “tutorial section” <----, thats where you go.

Read full topic

you need to download a source first, go to server downlaods to choose one.
